alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:25PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Umatilla County through 600 PM PDT... At 525 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Rieth, or 13 miles southwest of Pendleton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Umatilla County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
